mapper.select: /* 명예멘토 포함 멘토 조회 */ SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.member_password AS memberPw, m.search_member_password_answer AS memberPwAnswer, m.member_name AS memberName, m.member_phone_number AS memberTelNo, m.member_email AS memberEmail, m.member_join_YMD AS memberJoinYMD, maa.honor_mentor_YN AS isHonorMentor FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_level ml ON m.member_level_code=ml.member_level_code LEFT JOIN mentor_authority_approval maa ON m.member_id=maa.member_id WHERE m.member_withdrawal_YN = 'N' AND ml.member_level_code = 'member_level_mentor';

/* 명예멘토만 조회 */ SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.member_phone_number AS memberTelNo, m.member_email AS memberEmail FROM member m LEFT JOIN mentor_authority_approval maa ON m.member_id=maa.member_id WHERE m.member_withdrawal_YN = 'N' AND maa.honor_mentor_YN = 'Y';
